subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Lagares, who was named the best center fielder in baseball by winning the annual Fielding Bible award, is emerging as a key figure on the Mets as they try to become a contender again.
snippet: Lagares, who was named the best center fielder in baseball by winning the annual Fielding Bible award, is emerging as a key figure on the Mets as they try to become a contender again.
